pr_title: [Offline support] Remove old layers when inserting new ones

timeline.message: Delete saved layers before inserting new layers

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Please qualify Builder with Project instead - we'll often have more than one class called Builder imported at a time; by always qualifying by the outer class usage will be more consistent. Thanks!
timeline.author: gino-m

timeline.message:
fix variable type

the variable was named project but was actually of type Builder. So, change variable type to Project
